ComicInfo.Summary:
Four pages of comic strip and gag satires, using the form to present shocking gags. Individual titles include "My Bloody Anus"; "Drink My Piss, Motherfucker"; "The Square"; "Ain't She A Cunt?"; "Her Vagina Had Teeth"; "Oops"; "Grandpa Needs Dildos"; "Please Hurt My Oversized Testicles"; "Dim-Witted Genetic Atrocity With A Big Hard-On"; "Pontiff In My Pants"; "Mass Murderers Are Pretty Cool"; "Pardon My Sodomy, Son"; "Ms. Ann Thorpe"; "The Nu With Two Dicks"; "Neal Niszt"; "Don't Even Ask"; and "Fifty-Pound Clitoris".
Three satirical "Li'l Reactionary" comic strips.

ComicInfo.Title: Why Every Single Person In The Entire World Could Be Instantaneously Obliterated From The Face Of The Planet And I Wouldn't Turn To Look, Even If There Were A Loud Noise Or I Hate You. I Hate You All!; The Funnies; Yessir, I'm Just Another Completely Screwed-Up Catholic Boy; Please Kill Me!; The Ivan Ailment Chart; I Love Girls; "...And I Have Elaborate Torture Plans For All Of Them"; Li'l Reactionary; Hrrlfk! 1,784 Things That Make Me Vomit; Life Is Shit; Six Reasons Why I Wish I Had Been Man Ray; Everything Sucks
